column1: What is the primary goal of Information Security?
column2: To make systems faster and more user-friendly
column3: To safeguard information and systems from unauthorized access or damage
column4: To replace all manual processes with automation
column5: To safeguard information and systems from unauthorized access or damage
column6: InfoSec focuses on protecting data and systems from being viewed changed or destroyed by unauthorized parties.
